name: sbcbi2
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))

stmt.origin: sbcbid(s0, c0, wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), w0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))
-| wnf(s0, wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))
-| wnf(s0, wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wb(w0, w1))

|- wi(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wb(w0, w1))
|- wi(wal(s0, wb(w0, w1)), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))

comment: Substituting into equivalent wff's gives equivalent results. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 9-Apr-2018.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 4-May-2023.)
